main event: On July 6, 1957, Major Baker and three other officers observed a peculiar aerial object near Dobbins AFB.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at approximately 750 mph,The object was described as bluish white and oval-shaped,The object exhibited an erratic flight path and disappeared after about 15 minutes,The sighting was confirmed by S/SGT Hughes and Airman Sparks at Dobbins AFB,Upon preliminary analysis, the sighting was suggested to be caused by a meteorological disturbance.
witness description: Major Baker and three other officers
